publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4777 Ms Maureen Watt: Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts—That the Parliament commends Charley Elrick, Candi Tickle and Emma Waters, pupils at Kemnay Academy, for organising a golf tournament at Kemnay Golf Club to raise funds to allow pupils from Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar School to travel to Malawi to participate in community projects there and, furthermore, congratulates all 16 pupils from these two schools who intend to take part in this voluntary work programme.
S2M-4777 Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts (lodged on 12 September 2006) Brian Adam*, Helen Eadie*, Robin Harper*, Karen Gillon*, Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Mrs Nanette Milne*

S2M-4777 Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts (lodged on 12 September 2006) Bruce Crawford*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Chris Ballance*, Alex Neil*

S2M-4777 Ms Maureen Watt: Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts—That the Parliament commends Charley Elrick, Candi Tickle and Emma Waters, pupils at Kemnay Academy, for organising a golf tournament at Kemnay Golf Club to raise funds to allow pupils from Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar School to travel to Malawi to participate in community projects there and, furthermore, congratulates all 16 pupils from these two schools who intend to take part in this voluntary work programme. Supported by: Brian Adam, Helen Eadie, Robin Harper, Karen Gillon, Rob Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Mrs Nanette Milne, Bruce Crawford, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Mr Jamie Stone, Chris Ballance, Alex Neil, Dr Jean Turner*, Dave Petrie*
S2M-4777 Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts (lodged on 12 September 2006) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4777 Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts (lodged on 12 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4777 Kemnay Academy and Keith Grammar’s Malawi Efforts (lodged on 12 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
